link.Abstract: Follow Dose.ca on Twitter
link.title: Follow Dose.ca on Twitter

content.div:
Contrary to popular belief, life for Twilight hunk Robert Pattinson isn't all about glistening in the sunshine while frolicking in meadows with lady friend, Kristen Stewart.

Sometimes, it also involves ducking into seedy S&M clubs to "escape" from the hardship of fame.

Such was the case recently, when RPattz was shooting period piece Bel Ami in Berlin. Repeatedly chased by admirers, RPattz had no choice but to frequently duck into Berlin's infamous KitKatClub – a spot where "normal" clothes are discouraged in favour of more leathery fare.

And, according to UK tabloid The Sun, if he's ever "forced" inside again, he may bring company.

"I was telling my dad about it last night and he sounded really into it," the 25-year-old tells the paper. "He told me, 'I'm coming over -- let's go to the orgy club,'" a proposition the actor would be down for.

Clearly Pattinson is closer to his family than most. "They are the only people I really let rip on," he explained of his, um, interesting familial relationships.

So what are RPattz and RPattz Senior in for if they "let rip" on each other at the "orgy club?"

According to the Sun, they'll be watching a lot of German vampires get their freak on.

"The parties in there are crazy. It is dark and private so makes a great getaway for him," an insider told the paper. "It's perfect because on fetish nights -- and especially at Halloween -- there's always some people in there dressed up as vampires. The whole myth of biting and sucking blood is a big thing in the fetish world."

Or, as Pattinson refers to it, Tuesday.

jond@dose.ca

link.Abstract: Jennifer Lawrence and Kristen Stewart are about to have at least one thing in common: super-fame. Two things if you count mall tour-induced tinnitus.

link.Abstract: Check out the latest photos from the upcoming The Hunger Games.

link.Abstract: A new Hunger Games trailer will air during the Super Bowl -- but it' already hit the web. Watch it here.
link.title: Fill Up on New Hunger Games Footage

link.Abstract: If we learned one thing from Liam Hemsworth's Details interview, it's that the dude is easily distracted by squirrels. Funny, we're easily distracted by Liam Hemsworth. But who's cuter?! We're pretty sure we know how the Hunger Games star will be voting, but we'll let you decide. For each slide, cast your vote!
link.title: Who's Cuter: Liam Hemsworth or a Squirrel?

link.Abstract: The actress talks about abandoning Bella for Snow White.

link.Abstract: Taylor Swift and The Civil Wars debuted their Hunger Games music video "Safe & Sound." Check it out here, along with the movie soundtrack's full tracklisting, which features contributions from Arcade Fire and The Decemberists.

link.Abstract: At Target's midnight parties for the DVD release of Breaking Dawn, Part 1, the department store showed a never-before-seen clip from Breaking Dawn, Part 2.

link.Abstract: The young actor is doing everything these days -- including climbing palm trees between interviews.
link.title: Josh Hutcherson Says He Hungered for The Hunger Games

link.Abstract: Stewart offers up a standout performance as she finally gets some dramatic flesh to sink her teeth into, while Pattinson almost feels warm, despite his character’s icy skin. This may be the best Twilight yet.
link.title: Movie Review: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn, Part 1

link.Abstract: The actress takes a break from comedy for roles in Man on a Ledge and The Hunger Games.
